document_data.name: Phandalyn
document_data.mainbody: '''Phandalyn''' was a [[paladin]]{{Template:Cite game/Baldur's Gate: Enhanced Edition}} who lived in [[Baldur's Gate]] during the midâˆ’14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Template:Cite game/Baldur's Gate}}
document_data.Personality: Phandalyn was extremely judgmental. He would freely comment upon the moral outlook of passers-by. If Phandalyn sensed [[evil]]ness in anyone, he would readily attack them.
document_data.Activities: He frequented a rather unremarkable inn found in the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of Baldur's Gate.
document_data.Possessions: Phandalyn owned and wielded a ''+1 [[item enchantment|enchanted]]'' [[spear]].
